Keywords: Animal , Avengers , Defenders , Illuminati , Jean Grey School For Higher Learning , Scientist , X-Force , X-Men
Real Name: Hank McCoy
Special Powers
MOVEMENT: Elevated
RALLY (5): Opposing Attack Rolls. Outwit. // FREE: Remove Beast's RALLY die to use Outwit, even if it has already been used. (RALLY: Once per roll for each die in a finalized attack roll and for all characters with a matching RALLY die and trait color printed under their trait star, after resolutions you may choose a friendly character to gain a matching RALLY die. RALLY trait colors specify which attack type they can gain RALLY dies from. BLUE = Friendly Attack Rolls. RED = Opposing Attack Rolls. GREEN = All Attack Rolls. When a character gains a RALLY die, place a die with the matching result on their card.)
A GOOD STRATEGY DOES MORE THAN A PAIR OF FISTS: Close Combat Expert. // FREE: Remove a RALLY die from a friendly character. If you do, give a RALLY die to another friendly character.

Comments
November 10, 2022
DarkTortoise23
Now that rallies in the keywords beast is in are more varied and easier to obtain, beast continues to shine as a support piece. Originally, you could pretty much just turn one opposing 5 rally into another opposing 5 rally, but now you can take an easy to get allied 1 or 2 rally (or a green 3 or 4) and turn it into your most powerful opposing 5 or 6 rally and go to town, or vice versa if the situation calls for it. Put him on a team with people who generate rallies really fast and people who can spend it the best and you get the most value out of his humble 60 points.
October 19, 2022
Slade Wilson
I dunno, feels like his damage power should have included outwit in place of CCE.
October 14, 2021
SpaceTitanium
Really wish they had used this chance to give us a new Cat Beast in the new sculpt size, given that was his look at the time.
August 12, 2021
Goop
Strong piece with potential double outwit. The repositioning of rally is his greatest strength though. That can be extremely useful on the right team when combined with Moira. Strong atk/dmg too. Lots of keywords. Very good.
June 24, 2021
Bat-Phreak
@DarkTortoise23, I agree! Hank with both the Defenders KW -and- TA is long over-due, last seen in Xplosion!?!
June 16, 2021
DarkTortoise23
Yo I'm in love with this Hank. 60 points for trained outwit, potentially twice a turn, with 12/4 starting attack/damage and any team you could reasonably want Hank on? Easy sell. Great support and secondary attacker, the rally shifting is just frosting.
